name: Don't Kill Us
description:
This is a very early prototype.  Don't Kill Us is a top down, casual, puzzle game with what I hope will be a fun and unusual movement mechanic.  The goal of each level is to guide little robots safely through a "maze" of hazards and reach the exit(s).

My goal for uploading to itch.io is to hopefully get some feedback.  I want to know that if people enjoy the movement mechanic adding to the puzzles.

Thanks for your time

G
